title: Malicious Domain Containment
description: Threat intelligence indicates a domain is being used to host malware. An incident responder must block access to it.

tasks.description: Receive the malicious domain name from the threat intelligence platform.
tasks.expected_outcome: Responder has the IOC that needs to be blocked.

tasks.description: Add the domain to the blocklist on the corporate DNS server, so any internal requests to it will fail.
tasks.expected_outcome: Responder successfully blocks the domain at the DNS level.

tasks.description: Search historical DNS logs to see if any internal hosts have already tried to connect to the malicious domain.
tasks.expected_outcome: Responder proactively hunts for already-compromised hosts.
